exceptions.tactic: intros b a x H1 H2.
intros b' a x H1 H2.
intros b' a' x H1 H2.
intros b' a' x' H1 H2.

exceptions.exn: The reference Series_in_eq was not found in the current environment.
The LHS of Series_scal_l (Series (fun n : nat => _ * _ n)) does not match any subterm of the goal
The reference Series_mult was not found in the current environment.

original: intros b a x H1 H2. unfold PSeries, PS_mult. rewrite Series_in_eq. rewrite Series_scal_l. rewrite <- Series_mult.
